CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 13, 1952, pg. 14 reads: "Free To Courier Readers - Ralph Ellison, Tumpson Company representative, is shown as he exhibits one of Tumpson and Company's free gift sets of Fiesta Ware dinner settings which will be given away to Courier readers with any purchase at the store from now until Christmas. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tumpson Company representative Ralph Ellison, and Mary Dee wearing Persian lamb coat, displaying giveaway set of Fiesta Ware in Tumpson and Company showroom, another version
